119  std::shared_ptr<Obj> mObj;
120 
121  public:
123  typedef std::shared_ptr<Obj> Font::*unspecified_bool_type;
125  operator unspecified_bool_type() const { return ( mObj.get() == 0 ) ? 0 : &Font::mObj; }
126  void reset() { mObj.reset(); }
